entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] `Assertion: should not be reached at D:/a/_work/1/s/src/mono/mono/sgen/sgen-scan-object.h:93` in `System.Linq.Expressions.Tests` #95805
  • CA1510 (Use ArgumentNullException throw helper) shows up in netstandard2.0 projects that don't have the throw helper #95803
  • [API Proposal]: Allow setting explicit packing for 32 bit platforms only. #95802
  • [API Proposal]: ProcessThread.ThreadName #95800
  • `SocketsHttpHandler.ResponseHeaderEncodingSelector` may be ignored for Location headers #95799
    9.0.0
  • [browser][mt][hybrid] TestJapaneseCalendarDateParsing, PMDesignator_Get_ReturnsExpected_HybridGlobalization #95795
    9.0.0
  • WSL debugger: busy thread stops execution of other threads #95794
  • Interop tests crash on Mono #95792
  • [mono][aot] Investigate RAM consumption in Mono AOT compiler #95791
    9.0.0
  • ServiceDescriptor.ImplementationType throws exception for Keyed descriptor #95789
  • [API Proposal]: Remove Minimum or Maximum from SortedSet<T> in O(log n) time without comparisons #95780
  • Unable to establish SSL Connection issue - After OS Upgrade #95778
  • Test failure Attempt #1 - System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicConnectionTests.TestConnect(address: ::1) #95776

Closed

  • JIT: Validate DFS tree in post-phase checks #95652
    9.0.0
  • ReadOnlySpan<byte> SequenceEqual method seems to have regressed 25-30% between .Net 6 and .Net 8 #95703
  • Calling interface method of value type cause boxing #95202
  • ASP.NET 7 restarts docker container with error traps: .NET ThreadPool general protection fault error:0 in libc-2.31.so #95694
  • QuicListener.IsSupported behavior is flaky on DebianArm64 #95771
  • It doesn't support keyword Lock when debugging the clrcore by visual studio #5909
    Future
  • [Android] WebRequest causes SSL exception on Android API <= 23 on .NET 8 #94230
    8.0.x
  • AndroidMessageHandler or HttpClientHandler throw System.ObjectDisposedException: Cannot access a closed Stream #95658
  • APPCRASH System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException #95781
  • .NET 8 Per-Preview Performance report on WASM, Mono AOT, and Interpreter #84302
    9.0.0
  • AddJwtBearer doesn't consider system proxy settings #90985
  • How to set GCConserveMemory? #93914
  • NativeAOT crash with ConcurrentBag and interfaces #95574
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Respect ResponseHeaderEncodingSelector for the Location header #95810
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Reuse (new) loop-finding DFS in SSA #95809
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Re-add Stack Overflow handling in NativeAOT with larger alternate stack #95808
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • RemoveAllKeyed use Equals for matching #95807
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Remove outdated TODO in JsonWriterHelper.Escaping.cs #95806
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Disable IEnumerator test on Mono #95804
    disabled-test, area-Interop-mono
  • Remove some unnecessary string allocations in hosting layer #95801
    area-Host
  • Make the intermediate output path OS-specific for CoreCLR #95797
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: more CSE refactoring #95796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][fix] maxParallelDownloads #95793
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization fix localized DisplayName and LanguageName #95786
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [browser][MT] enable finalizer thread #95783
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Timespan int overloads #95779
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • workloads: Don't use wasm workload if PublishAot=true for nativeaot #95777
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm/wasi] Consolidate build targets #95775
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix location of fgFindJumpTargets comment #95774
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Remove Microsoft.SourceBuild.Intermediate from prebuilt baseline #95798
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Add post-phase validation of DFS tree #95682
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Added `SVE_GD_2A` ARM64 encoding #95618
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Use Program.dll instead of Program.exe in illink docs #95752
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Optimize a castclass over nullables #95764
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Provide System.Threading.RateLimiting package readme #94583
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Add support for enumerating keyed services with KeyedService.AnyKey #95582
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Remove dependency on AppDomain from a hello world app #95710
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: Remove most loop-related hoisting quirks #95734
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use full TLS record size for application data on Windows #95595
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Consuming the return type instead of an interface #95601
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Move a lock to protect m_pDynamicStaticsInfo #95769
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Generate interface lists for necessary EETypes #95683
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Convert HELPER_METHOD_FRAME to QCalls (4/N) #95670
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [Mono] Stop falling back to interpreter for runtime invoke #95469
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Added SVE_GK_2A and SVE_GL_1A arm64 encodings #95707
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve

Updated

  • JIT: Add explicit successor for BBJ_COND false branch #95773
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement more APIs in new TypeBuilder, fix bugs found during testing #95753
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • JIT: Add flowgraph dumping for new loops #95748
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • GT_STORE_BLK - do not call memset for blocks containg gc pointers on heap #95530
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove loop-related VN quirks #95729
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixing SignedXml.CheckSignature for enveloped signature with `#xpointer(/)` Reference #95404
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Use python venv for SPMI collection / jit rolling build #95714
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm] p/invoke and interop improvements #94446
    area-Build-mono, needs-author-action
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add CFG build for EventPipe enabled #95721
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Clean up the thread local memory regardless of managed thread's presence #95722
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add Arm N2 SVE perfscore file #95700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Make sure LOHThreshold less than region_size #95485
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [tests] Use shorter path for temp directory on Apple mobile platforms #95757
    os-ios, area-System.Formats.Tar, 9.0.0
  • Move `StartupHooks` tests and remaining uses of PortableApp project to pre-built test assets #95761
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Add package readmes (continued) #92228
    area-Meta, help wanted, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix JitDisasm in release build #95502
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Use a more performant way to get the current thread id #95609
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [browser][mt] dynamic thread create #95702
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [NO-MERGE][WIP] Testing Swift interop CI lines #95699
    NO-MERGE, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Small tweak for branch optimizer #95740
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][HybridGlobalization] Improve speed performance of IndexOf and LastIndexOf text APIs with HybridGlobalization mode #95583
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • WIP: Testing iOS library mode with NativeAOT on CI #94999
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • HashSet.UnionWith preformance improvement #92300
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Implement straightforward ServicePoint(Manager) properties in HttpWebRequest #94664
    area-System.Net
  • [browser] Added an optional HybridGlobalization run of libraries #95324
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Reduce use of madvise DODUMP/DONTDUMP #95643
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reenable disabled nativeaot warnings and fix the issues #95698
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [CI ONLY] [NativeAOT] ObjWriter in C# #92705
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Replaced string concatenation by StringBuilder usage #95760
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Implements more advanced ILLink/ILCompiler analysis for Type.GetMember #94879
    community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Light up String.Manipulation APIs with Vector512 codepath #93043
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • StreamOnSqlBytes Read/Write on Spans #86674
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • Add generic overloads to TensorPrimitives #94555
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Collection expressions: use constant indices when populating the span for a List<T> #71183
  • Enhance the Rename API to allow existing roslyn-internal features to work solely using the public API. #71177
  • An application of a CollectionBuilder attribute in source is not validated #71172

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34408.93 #71191
  • IDE0290 Primary Constructor should exclude possible error use cases(Compiler Error CS0103) #71167
  • Collection Initializer Expression `[]` should be disallowable per type (e.g. via Attribute?) #71171

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unnecessary check of trailing trivia for directives. #71185
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove navigation helpers based on line+offset #71184
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce size of source constructor symbol #71178
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove Microsoft.SourceBuild.Intermediate from prebuilt baseline #71175
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ensure the editorconfig for code-style analysis ("IDExxxx") rules is included #71173
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Add GetDeclaredSymbol overload for LocalFunctionStatementSyntax #71169
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • [WIP] Split integration test build from test run #71166
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Convert type into a struct. #71181
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove dead code from unit testing codepaths #71190
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify how data flows through the rename system. #71176
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add test for Use Collection Expression #71174
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure we publish symbols for the BuildHost #71165
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix 'use primary constructor' when moving attribute with reference to member in that type. #71168
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add QuickInfo for collection expression brackets #71161
    Area-IDE, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, Next
  • Skip the pack and publish steps in integration tests #71153
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Add some more incremental generator docs #71059
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update the C# syntax generator to use aliases to lower the amount of large qualified namespaces emitted to distinguish internal and public types. #69703
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Backlog
  • Use CPS for tests where saving documents needs to be reliable #70983
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add back request telemetry in CLaSP queue #71157
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Gladstone #71135
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Run Spanish tests on CoreClr #67748
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: tests for spreads of dynamic and non-generic IEnumerable collections #71158
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Start local function analysis with captured variables marked "not null" #71148
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Update status/details on implicit indexers in object initializers #71164
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Make trivial Params Collections scenarios working end to end #71136
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Collection expressions: align ConversionsBase.GetCollectionExpressionTypeKind() with spec #70975
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Loosen compiler restriction which was not required by the spec #71110
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • WIP: Testing insertion cost. #70160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: synthesize singleton list type for IEnumerable<T>, IReadOnlyCollection<T>, IReadOnlyList<T> #71147
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Use new helper type for initializing a value type field only once, and in a threadsafe manner. #71013
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Delay slicing in list pattern until all other element patterns are matched #70615
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.9

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Data Protection Key Generation Race #52678
  • Quarantine ShutdownTimeoutIsApplied #52676
  • Publish failure for a standalone WASM app #52673
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #52671
  • Registration confirmation link incorrect for /register endpoint in net8.0 Identity #52666
  • IUrlHelper.Action() inexplicably takes callsite action context into account for determining target action. #52665
  • Failed to establish a connection to https://127.0.0.1:5552/: net::ERR_CONNECTION_RESET while try to run WebTransportInteractiveSampleApp #52663
  • Blazor Web App - doesn't work Authorisation via the Google #52662
  • [API Proposal]: Microsoft.AspNetCore.OutputCaching consider adding a way to change expiration time based on logic in IOutputCachePolicy #52670
  • AspNetCore.Identity against ADFS #52661
  • Blazor Net 8 interactive auto <NotFound> not triggerd #52660
  • AuthenticationScheme Issue - No DefaultChallengeScheme Found #52657
  • SignalR | Electron | CookieJar is creating issue with Electron .Net App + Angular 14 #52656
  • Blazor RenderTreeBuilder avoid boxing and strings allocations #52655
  • opportunity to add (load) root components via javascript when interactivity in current page is not enabled. #52654
  • Seperate SignInManager and UserManager concerns #52650
  • Blazor needs to force reload pages with scripts #52649
  • Investigate metrics endpoint behavior when exception middleware runs #52648

Closed

  • Data protection: Near-simultaneous keys created in key ring #52561
  • Quarantine HelixPlatform_QuicListenerIsSupported #52623
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #52611
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #52639
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #52653
  • Make IDataProtectionKeyContext settable #52645
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #52640
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries, single_query #52473
  • ./restore.cmd error #52374

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce allocations in MakeArrayFormatter #52675
    area-blazor
  • Revert "Unskip HelixPlatform_QuicListenerIsSupported on debian 12 (#52235) #52674
    area-networking
  • Add null check for connectionId #52672
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Update SDK to 23608.3 #52669
    area-infrastructure
  • Add endpoint metadata to developer exception page #52668
    feature-diagnostics, community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Remove Microsoft.SourceBuild.Intermediate from prebuilt baseline #52667
    area-infrastructure
  • Use SHA256 for RPM digest #52664
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix metrics duration and http.route tag with exception handling #52652
    area-hosting

Merged

  • Migrate to the Locker GitHub action for locking closed/stale issues/PRs #52651
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Quarantine ShutdownTimeoutIsApplied #52677
    area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `76bb2af` to `b3a9ba2` #52658
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [Blazor] Fix `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.props` not getting packed correctly #52638
    area-blazor
  • [2.1] Fix IPNetwork.Contains for prefixes which are not at start of subnet range. #50967
    Servicing-consider, area-networking, area-middleware, 2.1.x
  • [release/8.0] Update SDK version #50734
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Fix misdetection of component comments #52647
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] Remove InvariantGlobalization in templates (#52428) #52461
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Checkbox broken in Android #19313
  • Border shadow not rendered correctly #19312
  • .Net Maui8 VisualElement.TranslateTo() runs incorrectly #19311

Closed

  • TextToSpeech rate and current reading index #15290
  • Reland #7143 ([X] simplify and avoid duplication in conversion) #9294
    Under Consideration
  • FlyoutPage is not scrollable in MacCatalyst #16938
    Backlog
  • Issue #19307
  • [regression/8.0.3] [Android] Unable to set Button CornerRadius to 0 #19052
    Backlog
  • Button CornerRadius is not working with BackgroundColor #18090
    Backlog
  • [regression/8.0.3] MAUI Ignores Button.CornerRadius = '0' on Android device #18807
    .NET 8 SR3
  • Java.Lang.IllegalStateException: Can not perform this action after onSaveInstanceState on MAUI Blazor (Hybrid) when opened from Android IntentFilter #19304
  • FlyoutPage.IsPresented=false throws InvalidOperationException: 'Can't change IsPresented when setting Default' #11785
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow for disabling default MAUI usings when embedding #19314
    area/native-embedding
  • [Trimming] Add a feature flag to disable XAML loading at runtime #19310

Merged

    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix for button cornerradius 0 on android #18959
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨

Updated

  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling Improvements and UITests (not from fork) #17670
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, area/keyboard, Under Consideration
  • Add design time converters #19301
  • NativeAOT: Add integration tests for testing MAUI compatibility with NativeAOT on iOS #19194
    community ✨
  • Allow GesturePlatformManager to be created for views with null window… #18938
    community ✨, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR2
  • Avoid zero-length array allocations #19300
    community ✨
  • Improve appium install on CI build agents #19248
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, area/testing, testing-flakiness

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to Scaffold DBContext if tables in SQL Server have certain names #32571
  • Test/Cleanup: some adhoc tests that are provider only because hardcoded column types etc can be moved from provider to relational/core #32570
  • Test/Cleanup: move adhoc groupby tests into separate file #32568
  • Query: normalize compiler generated closure parameter names #32567
  • Change tracker ignores default value setting on non nullable properties #32565
  • InMemoryDatabase Not Respecting Schema: Shared Table Content Across Contexts #32564
  • Throw for sync APIs when using Cosmos since they do sync over async #32563
  • Parameter_collection_Concat_column_collection fails with latest SQLite #32561
  • Query: investigate result discrepancy between sqlserver and sqlite for compex query with multiple nested subqueries and max #32559
  • Look into making SelectExpression (more) immutable, getting rid of TableReferenceExpression #32558
  • Is it possible to configure to increment a property of an entity every time I call to SaveChages()? #32557
  • Migration rollback resulting in weird behavior in Snapshot file #32555

Closed

  • Remove QueryBugsTest class #1015
    MQ
  • [.Net Framework 4.8]Library e_sqlite3 not found #19396
    8.0.0
  • HasDefaultValueSql removal on AutoGen since EF Core 8 update #32566
  • Sqlite.NetTopologySuite caused the program to crash. Failure module:libwinpthread-1.dll #14561
    8.0.0
  • EFCore Contains convert openjson with type is error #32529
  • Special folders as file location for DB #32380
  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.Design scaffold t4 template problem. #32556
  • Error when Converting SQL Query to LINQ Query with Group By and Distinct Count #32554

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Fix splitting migrations SQL by GO #32572
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.x
  • Ensure that, by convention, dependent properties have the same element type as principal properties #32560

Merged

  • Fix to #1015 - Remove QueryBugsTest class #32542
  • Allow the last DbContext to be registered to use nongeneric options #32569
  • Test new sqlite3mc SQLitePCLRaw bundle #32562
  • Fix splitting migrations SQL by GO #32548
  • Add DbContextOptions composibility support #32518
    breaking-change

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Fix Contains within SQL Server aggregate functions #32543
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/8.0] Make proxies thread-safe accessing a navigation once loaded #32547
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-08
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Installer is failing to synchronize in sourcebuild #17682
  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't run crossgen in cross-arch VMR vertical builds #17937
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #17936
  • [VMR] Initial attempt at a Mac VMR build #17934

Merged

  • Remove Microsoft.SourceBuild.Intermediate from prebuilt baseline #17935
  • Use SHA256 for RPM digest #17933
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #17806

Updated

  • Fix attribute type checking and use null-conditional operator #17902
